channel.title: [Galkon]Godsword Gfx

item.title: [Galkon]Godsword Gfx
item.dc:creator: @iTanq iTanq
item.description:
@iTanq wrote:

I need the godsword gfx ints for Galkon’s, and the models. Also, where would I put them?

These are my current GFX ints:

if(j == 600){ // Bandos
	cache[j].anInt405 = 10555;// Model
	cache[j].anInt406 = 7001; // animation
	cache[j].aAnimation_407 = Animation.anims[cache[j].anInt406];// Update
			}
if(j == 601){ // Armadyl
	cache[j].anInt405 = 10112;
	cache[j].anInt406 = 7004;
	cache[j].aAnimation_407 = Animation.anims[cache[j].anInt406];
			}
if(j == 602){ // Saradomin
	cache[j].anInt405 = 10113;
	cache[j].anInt406 = 7003;
	cache[j].aAnimation_407 = Animation.anims[cache[j].anInt406];
			}
if(j == 629){ // Zamorak
	cache[j].anInt405 = 8223;
	cache[j].anInt406 = 7002;
	cache[j].aAnimation_407 = Animation.anims[cache[j].anInt406];
			}
		}
	}

And the specs look like this:

EDIT:

How do I position the character lower? And also, the exit button doesn’t want to load with this code:

		addSprite(15107, 7, "CUSTOM");
		addHoverButton(15210, "CUSTOM", 8, 21, 21, "Close", 250, 15211, 3);
		addHoveredButton(15211, "CUSTOM", 9, 21, 21, 15212);

Read full topic
